short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Minimal low overhead dark mode provider for web sites with custom settings and keyboard shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Minimal low overhead dark mode provider for web sites with custom settings and keyboard shortcuts.

Ctrl + Shift + Y toggles dark mode for a website.
Ctrl + Shift + H toggles grayscale mode.

Customize brightness and contrast in options.

Dark mode is applied to website pages with some delay after a page is loaded (customizable in options).

Note: some websites require selecting "Forced Mode" or "Skip IFrames" for better results.

Source code: https://github.com/gwroblew/darktoggle
